title: Incase you didn't know, you can do this on the Boards
body:
So you can type a minimum of  4 underscores (they look like this _ wight he line at the bottom) and it will divide the page/wall of text up nicely.
_____

So like this basically
_____

Just thought I might let those who might-not-know know

replies.body:
----
## There's some pretty neat stuff you can do! 
----
You can even make tables with text alignment:

| Champion       | Coolness  |  Awesomeness level |
|: ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
| Karma      |Super Cool   | The Best||
|Ashe      | Ice Cold     |  Stunning|
| Lulu | Purple     |   Adoribus! |

Feel free to check out how that's done by hitting quote on this post. 

[This thread here gives some good examples of neat things you can do in boards! ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101)

###### You can even use really small text for your footnotes!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Zaps,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NcnzuEn3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-06T08:08:08.016+0000)
>
> ----
> ## There's some pretty neat stuff you can do! 
> ----
> You can even make tables with text alignment:
> 
> | Champion       | Coolness  |  Awesomeness level |
> |: ------------- |:-------------:| -----:|
> | Karma      |Super Cool   | The Best||
> |Ashe      | Ice Cold     |  Stunning|
> | Lulu | Purple     |   Adoribus! |
> 
> Feel free to check out how that's done by hitting quote on this post. 
> 
> [This thread here gives some good examples of neat things you can do in boards! ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/YHPBc6k3-board-formatting-101)
>
